query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: 1=1 and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.mainNetSortOne , est.todeptid ,est.senduserid ,est.sendtime from EST_COMMONFAULT est where est.ENDTIME>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: 1=1 and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.operate_bigRole_id=191 and est.mainid not in (select estp.mainid from EST_COMMONFAULT estp where estp.mainid=est.mainid and (estp.operate_bigRole_id=192 and estp.OPERATETYPE=46) or (estp.operate_bigRole_id=193 and estp.OPERATETYPE=46) ) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.mainNetSortOne , est.todeptid ,est.senduserid ,est.sendtime from EST_COMMONFAULT est where est.ENDTIME>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.operate_bigRole_id=191 and est.mainid not in (select estp.mainid from EST_COMMONFAULT estp where estp.mainid=est.mainid and (estp.operate_bigRole_id=192 and estp.OPERATETYPE=46) or (estp.operate_bigRole_id=193 and estp.OPERATETYPE=46) ) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@'
